sentences.en: ...a motley collection of vans, old buses, cattle trucks, and even a fire engine.
sentences.cn: ...杂七杂八的一堆车，有运货车、旧公共汽车、运牛卡车，甚至有一辆消防车。

sentences.en: A strange and motley set they were, these friends of the Chevalier.
sentences.cn: 骑士的这班朋友真是五花八门, 无奇不有.

sentences.en: His friends were a motley crew.
sentences.cn: 他的朋友三教九流全有.

sentences.en: His interpretations on history are far less strained than those of Motley.
sentences.cn: 他对于历史的解释不象莫特利那样牵强.

sentences.en: His pockets contained a motley collection of coins, movie ticket stubs, and old candies.
sentences.cn: 他的口袋里乱七八糟地放了很多东西，有硬币、电影票票根，还有很久以前的糖果。

sentences.en: I looked at the motley bunch we were sailing with and began to feel uneasy about the trip.
sentences.cn: 我看着船上同行的那些杂七杂八的人，对这次航行担心起来。

sentences.en: Motley makes his villains excessively villainous and his heroes wearisomely heroic.
sentences.cn: 莫特利把坏人写得过于无赖,把他的英雄写得过于英勇.

sentences.en: Motley, for his part , makes his villains excessively villainous and his heroes wearisomely heroic.
sentences.cn: 讲到莫特利,他把他的坏人写得过于无赖,把他的英雄写得过于英勇.

sentences.en: Motley, for his part , makes his villains excessively villainous and his heros wearisomely heroic.
sentences.cn: 讲到莫特利, 他把他的坏人讲得过于无赖,把他的英雄写得过于英勇,看了使人厌倦.

sentences.en: Motley: This agile thing is actually pretty cool and has some benefits.
sentences.cn: 马特里: 这种敏捷开发确实听上去挺酷的,有点好处.

sentences.en: The audience consisted of a motley crowd of property owners, renters, and drifters.
sentences.cn: 观众中各色人等都有,有地产所有者 、 租赁人和流浪汉.

sentences.en: The audience was a motley crew of students and tourists.
sentences.cn: 观众是一群混杂在一起的学生和游客.

sentences.en: The motley company had increased to ten.
sentences.cn: 这群乌合之众已经增加到了十个人.

sentences.en: The people she'd invited were a pretty motley crew.
The room was filled with a motley collection of furniture and paintings.
sentences.cn: 屋子里摆满了五花八门的家具和绘画。

sentences.en: The room was soon filled with a motley assemblage.
sentences.cn: 不多一会儿,屋子里便挤满了形形色色的来开会的人.

sentences.en: The volunteers seem a motley crew.
sentences.cn: 志愿者里似乎什么人都有。

sentences.en: They are wearing a motley collection of old clothes.
sentences.cn: 他们穿着各式各样的旧衣服.

trans.tran_cn: 混杂的，杂色的，五颜六色的
trans.tran_en: You can describe a group of things as a motley collection if you think they seem strange together because they are all very different
